Room.Name: Stairway of the Nobles
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the third level of the Stairway of the Nobles in Castle Rutger.
Room.LongDescription: A long hallway runs east and west, and several closed doors appear to have access here. These are the apartments of some of Rutger's closest friends, adventurers who have pledged their loyalty to him. Along the hall you see oil paintings and banners of some of the residents.
